EmailTemplate.name: Initial Cold Prospecting email
EmailTemplate.subject: Palmetto Solar - We'd like to Partner with <Company Name>
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.Name},
My name is Mike Schamp and Iâ€™m reaching out from Palmetto Solar. I'm responsible for building our nationwide network of Build Partners.
We have a unique marketplace model that delivers ready-to-install projects to our Build Partners. We handle all the upfront work and provide a permit packet, design, and bill of materials. We are currently providing ready-to-install projects across more than 20 states with more than 75 current Build Partners.
We need more capacity in the {State or Region}. I would love to connect and have an introductory call to see if partnering with Palmetto makes sense for {Company Name}. If we feel like it's a good fit, I'm happy to share our MSA and other resources I'm sure you'll find helpful. Please Use This Meeting Link to view my availability and schedule a time directly on my calendar at your earliest convenience.
Cheers,
